price: 31. Dheh: Suga (geeridayda)! Aniguna waxaan sugi (waxa idinku dhaca).
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
